text: Carmen Elizabeth Ejogo (; born 22 October 1973)Family Search. Retrieved 11/22/14."Birth Registration Details", Ancestry.co.uk (retrieved 19 July 2009). is an English actress and singer. Ejogo is best known for her roles in Metro (1997), The Avengers (1998), Love's Labour's Lost (2000), What's the Worst That Could Happen? (2001), Boycott (2001), Away We Go (2009), Sparkle (2012), Alex Cross (2012), The Purge: Anarchy (2014), Selma (2014), Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016), It Comes at Night (2017), Alien: Covenant (2017), and Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018). In 1998, she was married to musician Tricky for a short time. In 2004, she married actor Jeffrey Wright. They divorced in 2014. They had two children. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London Category:Singers from London Category:People from the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea
title: Carmen Ejogo
